response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is worth $1,500,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value, providing you with an excellent return on investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
